I

isAllowed(Player) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Action
Decides if the action can be completed based on if the player has or can see the items required for the action.
isPortable() - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Item
Method used to tell if the item can be picked up by the player.
Item - Class in bcu.s17119577.adventure.model
This class models every item in the game.
Item(String, String) - Constructor for class bcu.s17119577.adventure.model.Item
The constructor creates a non portable item with a given name, description and no location.
